DataElement.preferredName: Patient English Spanish French Language Comprehension Yes No Unknown Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no/unknown indicator specifying if the person can read/speak English or Spanish or French.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient English Spanish French Language Comprehension
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Denotes the inhabitants of England, a person from there, or their descendants elsewhere._Denotes a person from Spain or of Spanish descent._Denotes the inhabitants of France, a person from there, or their descendants elsewhere._A systematic means of communicating by the use of sounds, symbols, or gestures._An ability to understand the meaning or importance of something (or the knowledge acquired as a result).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: Denotes the inhabitants of England, a person from there, or their descendants elsewhere.:Denotes a person from Spain or of Spanish descent.:Denotes the inhabitants of France, a person from there, or their descendants elsewhere.:A systematic means of communicating by the use of sounds, symbols, or gestures.:An ability to understand the meaning or importance of something (or the knowledge acquired as a result).

Concepts.definition: Denotes the inhabitants of England, a person from there, or their descendants elsewhere.
Denotes a person from Spain or of Spanish descent.
Denotes the inhabitants of France, a person from there, or their descendants elsewhere.
A systematic means of communicating by the use of sounds, symbols, or gestures.
An ability to understand the meaning or importance of something (or the knowledge acquired as a result).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Is the patient fluent in Engl
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient fluent in English, Spanish or French?
